name: STAR: Super Twisted Arena Run
description:
STAR: Super Twisted Arena Run is a game where many levels with crazy obstacles await you! Bizarre traps, serious enemies, and even elementary laws of physics stand in the way of your victory!

Your goal is to stay as long as you can. Pass the obstacle course and reach the end of this insane coliseum filled with fun! Each round is unique, and new trials will be harder than previous ones. You'll need all your skills to get the victory! Upgrade your skills and win!

HOW TO PLAY?

The game has several rounds. Each round is a race on a dangerous trail where you'll have to dodge various traps. To get to the next round, you need to reach the finish line. In the last round, you should survive in the arena to win! Can you do that?

GAME FEATURES:

- Many levels of different difficulty levels
- Hard obstacle courses with different traps
- Bright and colorful graphics
- Funny ragdoll physics
- Easy controls
- Intuitive interface
- So. Much. Fun!

STAR: Super Twisted Arena Run is absolutely free to download! The real fun is waiting for you! Can you win?

Please note that our game offers a VIP-membership subscription (VIP). This subscription lasts for 7 days and is auto-renewable. The cost of the subscription is USD 3.99 per week. You can cancel the subscription in your device subscriptions settings.
